description: {"blocks":[{"key":"41sfj","text":"This is the 10X Genomics protocol to fix, dissociate, and profile RNA from human ovary tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"53h78","text":"This protocol needs prior approval by the users' institutional review board (IRB) or equivalent ethics committee(s).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"caf0o","text":"Refers to the various protocol documents for a complete list of the materials required.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ah7lm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gs92","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"auvkq","text":"The following user guides from 10X Genomics were used for the different steps: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvuii","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hlho","text":"Tissue Fixation \u0026 Dissociation for Chromium Fixed RNA Profiling: CG000553 Rev B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":65,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pfpq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvcdg","text":"Chromium Fixed RNA Profiling Reagent Kits for Multiplexed Samples: CG000527 Rev E ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djkrv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"692su","text":"Chromium Fixed RNA Profiling Multiplexed Samples Pooling Workbook: CG000565 RevB","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebhin","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ejecp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lap8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"70v5g","text":"The protocol CG000553 REV B was used to fix, dissociate, and isolate cells/nuclei from frozen human ovaries with the following modifications: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nn57","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e2mu","text":"1) 0.2 mg / mL of Liberase TH was used for dissociation at Step 2b, Page 6.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rbmh","text":"2) Two extra \"spin only\" (i.e., steps 3 and 4 ) of the octodissociator protocol were run for each sample due to the presence of intact/ large tissue pieces at the end of the run at Step 2c, Page 6.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfhn","text":"3) Counts were performed using the Cellaca PLX Automated Cell counter (PN: PLX-SYS1) and ViaStain AOPI staining solution (PN: CS2-0106-5mL) at Step 2i on page 6. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s5ul","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqtgm","text":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression-flex/documentation/steps/sample-prep/tissue-fixation-and-dissociation-for-chromium-single-cell-gene-expression-flex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":179}],"data":{}},{"key":"5u5bc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"609v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"154D4692F6CE11EEAF630A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression-flex/documentation/steps/sample-prep/tissue-fixation-and-dissociation-for-chromium-single-cell-gene-expression-flex"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9etju","text":"The protocol CG000527 Rev E  was used to generate gene expression libraries from fixed cell/nuclei suspension inputs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t322","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1n5ng","text":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression-flex/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-gene-expression-flex-reagent-kits-for-multiplexed-samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":180}],"data":{}},{"key":"69ml1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lcun","text":"Samples were multiplexed in batches of 16 using the user guide CG000565. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1f9vk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bf07f","text":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression-flex/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-gene-expression-flex-reagent-kits-for-multiplexed-samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":180}],"data":{}},{"key":"6gpa1","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87vb7","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74k7t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"688BF504F6CE11EEAF630A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression-flex/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-gene-expression-flex-reagent-kits-for-multiplexed-samples"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"A0CC42E8F6CE11EEAF630A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression-flex/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-gene-expression-flex-reagent-kits-for-multiplexed-samples"}}}}
